pathAssistantSteps.info: • Check to see if an open follow up Task already exists. If not, create a Task to set yourself a reminder to complete the follow up
• Accept the Case from the Queue to take ownership to start working the issue

• Complete investigation in to the customer issue and resolve it if possible
  • User the DERM and CONSOLE buttons to quickly and easily access these source systems
  • Leverage the Member 360 and View Autodoc buttons to view detailed member information and previously completed work on this Case
  • Ensure you add Case Comments and Autodoc the work you have done
  • If a follow up with the customer is required, move the Case in to the Follow Up stage or else Close the Case
• Accept the Case from the Queue to take ownership and start working this issue

• If the Case Origin is Email or Web, please complete the Member Search process first and proceed to working the Case prior to Routing or Closing
  • Use the DERM and CONSOLE buttons to quickly and easily access these source systems
  • Ensure you add Case Comments and Autodoc the work you have done
  • Select the Route button to automatically route the Case to the correct team if further work is required, or else Close the Case
